item.title: CVE-2024-37446|2024-08-02T03:57:39.115Z -- kiboko%20labs -- chained%20quiz
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kiboko Labs Chained Quiz allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Chained Quiz: from n/a through 1.3.2.8.
